languages.text: "...по{mf|дин|жа}! Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, вы меня слышите?" {n}Сквозь гул и биение прорывается знакомый голос — это сенешаль Абеляр Версериан, склонившийся над вами и обеспокоенно заглядывающий вам в лицо. Заметив ваш взгляд, он облегченно вздыхает:{/n} "Вы живы... это больше, чем я от вас ожидал после того, что вы устроили!"

"—{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaning over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"
languages.original_text: "...по{mf|дин|жа}! Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, вы меня слышите?" {n}Сквозь гул и биение прорывается знакомый голос — это сенешаль Абеляр Версериан, склонившийся над вами и обеспокоенно заглядывающий вам в лицо. Заметив ваш взгляд, он облегченно вздыхает:{/n} "Вы живы... это больше, чем я от вас ожидал после того, что вы устроили!"

traits.locale_text: "...{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaned over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive and sane... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

"...{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaned over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive and sane... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

"—{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaning over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive and sane... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

"—{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaning over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive and sane... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

"—{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaning over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

languages.text: “——人！{name}！{name}大人，能听到我说话吗？”{n}某个熟悉的声音从轰鸣声中浮现。阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领正俯下身子看着你，满脸焦虑。当他注意到你也在看他的时候，他松了口气。{/n}“您还活着……考虑到您刚刚经历的事情，这样的结果比我预期得要好！”
languages.original_text: "—{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaning over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

traits.locale_text: “——人！{name}！{name}大人，能听到我说话吗？”{n}某个熟悉的声音从轰鸣声中浮现。阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领正俯下身子看着你，满脸焦虑。当他注意到你也在看他的时候，他松了口气。{/n}“您还活着，意识也很清醒……考虑到您刚刚经历的事情，这样的结果比我预期得要好！”

languages.text: «¡... str{mf|o|a} {name}! ¡Maestr{mf|o|a} {name}, ¿me oye?». {n}Una voz familiar atraviesa el estruendo y el palpitar: el Senescal Abelard Werserian se inclina sobre ti, examinando tu rostro con aspecto preocupado. Al ver que reaccionas, suspira de alivio.{/n} «Está viv{mf|o|a}... ¡es más de lo que esperaba después de lo que acaba de hacer!».
languages.original_text: "—{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaning over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

traits.locale_text: «¡... str{mf|o|a} {name}! ¡Maestr{mf|o|a} {name}, ¿me oye?». {n}Una voz familiar atraviesa el estruendo y el palpitar: el Senescal Abelard Werserian se inclina sobre ti, examinando tu rostro con aspecto preocupado. Al ver que reaccionas, suspira de alivio.{/n} «Está viv{mf|o|a} y cuerd{mf|o|a}... ¡es más de lo que esperaba después de lo que acaba de hacer!».

languages.text: 「…{name}様！{name}様、聞こえますか？」{n}耳鳴りと脈打つ音を切り裂くように聞き覚えのある声が響く。家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンがあなたの上に身を乗り出し、心配そうな表情で顔を覗き込んでいる。彼はあなたの視線に気づき、安堵のため息をつく。{/n}「生きておられる….あのようなことをした後で、本当に予想外です！」
languages.original_text: "—{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaning over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

traits.locale_text: 「…{mf|スター|ストレス} {name}！{mf|マスター|ミストレス} {name}、聞こえますか？」{n}騒音と連打の音の間に聞き覚えのある声が聞こえた。家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンがあなたの上に身を乗り出し、心配そうな表情で顔を覗き込んでいる。彼はあなたの視線に気づき、安堵のため息をつく。{/n}「あなたは生きていて正気だ….あなたがたった今したことを考慮すれば、私が期待していた以上に正気だ！」
「…{name}様！{name}様、聞こえますか？」{n}耳鳴りと脈打つ音を切り裂くように聞き覚えのある声が響く。家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンがあなたの上に身を乗り出し、心配そうな表情で顔を覗き込んでいる。彼はあなたの視線に気づき、安堵のため息をつく。{/n}「生きておられる….あのようなことをした後で、本当に予想外です！」

languages.original_text: "—{mf|ster|stress} ! {mf|Master|Mistress} , can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaning over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

languages.text: « ...{mf|tre|tresse} {name} ! {mf|Maître|Maîtresse} {name}, vous m'entendez ? » {n}Une voix familière s'élève au-dessus du vacarme et du martèlement : le sénéchal Abélard Werserian, penché sur vous, observe votre visage avec la plus grande inquiétude. Il remarque votre regard et pousse un soupir de soulagement.{/n} « Vous êtes en vie... Je n'en attendais pas tant après ce que vous venez de faire ! »
languages.original_text: "—{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaning over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

traits.locale_text: « ...{mf|tre|tresse} {name} ! {mf|Maître|Maîtresse} {name}, vous m'entendez ? » {n}Une voix familière s'élève au-dessus du vacarme et du martèlement : le sénéchal Abélard Werserian, penché sur vous, observe votre visage avec la plus grande inquiétude. Il remarque votre regard et pousse un soupir de soulagement.{/n} « Vous êtes en vie et vous avez toute votre tête... Je n'en attendais pas tant après ce que vous venez de faire ! »

languages.text: "– {mf|err|errin} {name}! {mf|Herr|Herrin} {name}, könnt Ihr mich hören?" {n}Eine vertraute Stimme dringt durch das Getöse – Truchsess Abelard Werserian beugt sich über dich und sieht dir besorgt ins Gesicht. Er bemerkt deinen Blick und atmet erleichtert aus.{/n} "Ihr seid am Leben ... womit ich nach dem, was Ihr gerade getan habt, nicht gerechnet hätte!"
languages.original_text: "—{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaning over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

traits.locale_text: "– {mf|err|errin} {name}! {mf|Herr|Herrin} {name}, könnt Ihr mich hören?" {n}Eine vertraute Stimme dringt durch das Getöse – Truchsess Abelard Werserian beugt sich über dich und sieht dir besorgt ins Gesicht. Er bemerkt deinen Blick und atmet erleichtert aus.{/n} "Ihr seid am Leben und bei Verstand ... womit ich nach dem, was Ihr gerade getan habt, nicht gerechnet hätte!"

languages.text: "...{mf|Ey|Anım} {name}! {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, beni duyabiliyor musunuz?" {n}Tanıdık bir ses onca gürültüyü, gümlemeyi yarıp geçiyor. Sana doğru eğilmiş olan Seneşal Abelard Werserian, endişeli bir ifadeyle yüzüne bakıyor. Bakışlarını fark edince rahat bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Hayattasınız. Az evvel yaptığınızdan sonra aklıma çok daha kötüsü gelmişti!"
languages.original_text: "—{mf|ster|stress} {name}! {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, can you hear me?" {n}A familiar voice cuts through the din and the pounding — Seneschal Abelard Werserian is leaning over you, peering into your face with a look of worry. He notices your gaze and breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You are alive... which is more than I was expecting after what you just did!"

traits.locale_text: "...{mf|ey|anım} {name}! {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, beni duyabiliyor musunuz?" {n}Tanıdık bir ses onca gürültüyü, gümlemeyi yarıp geçiyor. Sana doğru eğilmiş olan Seneşal Abelard Werserian, endişeli bir ifadeyle yüzüne bakıyor. Bakışlarını fark edince rahat bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Hayattasınız. Az evvel yaptığınızdan sonra aklıma çok daha kötüsü gelmişti!"
